comment: One of the best professors I've had. She's approachable, understanding and helpful. Wants everyone to make an A, and it's easy if you put in the effort. Weekly module online plus 4 papers that are essentially tests. She keeps lecture interesting, and made the class feel more connected. You need the books but they're cheap
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria

comment: Fair grader and workload is not at all stressful as long as you get it done on time. You won't regret taking her for comp II.

Ms. Buonomo is awesome! I would take her again hands down, she makes Comp II (English 1102) really easy as long as you put some effort in. She is extremely understanding and I'd recommend her to anyone taking Comp II. Interesting class discussions, and good feedback on papers. Good at being non-biased, good at lecturing. I could go on and on.

The best English professor I've ever had. She is reasonable with the workload and genuinely cares about her students. I took the hybrid class so we had weekly modules that don't take to long to complete. Besides that the grade came from short online quizzes and a 3-4 essays. She's really a beautiful person inside and out.

I took this as a hybrid, and it was the simplest class. You show up once a week with an assignment due at the end of the week. About 4 essays through the year, no tests, easy short online quizzes. She is caring and understanding. It's difficult to fail if you do all the work.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: I seriously love Ms. Buonomo! She is the sweetest lady at Kennesaw hands down. I took her last spring for 1102 and she made me like literature. She cares about what you have to say and really tries to work with you. As long as you do the readings and actually put in a little effort during discussion you will love her as much as I did!

She was a very good teacher. I took the hybrid class so we went once per week and the rest was online. Online work wasn't hard, completed within 20 mins. There were a couple of papers but the topics were easy to expand on and she gives great feedback. I'd definitely take her again.

Ms. Carolyn is absolutely wonderful! She is lenient, caring, and wants to make sure you succeed. She's a fantastic professor, and I would take her again in a heartbeat. I would also highly recommend taking hybrid with her. It's not hard, and you only have to go to class one day out of the week.

Ms. Carolyn is the sweetest professor out there. She grades based on what she thinks you are capable of. She makes you want to do good. 3 papers and a final project which is a website. She is easy and understands.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Ms. Buonomo is a great professor. I had a hybrid class. She responds to emails very clearly and quickly. I enjoyed most of her assingmnets as well.

Carolyn is one of the sweetest professors out there. Anytime I would email her for my English 1101 class about  a paper, she would always help me tweak it until it was perfect. She does give 100s on papers and she's so nice. Some of her assignments are a little confusing at first, but she will be more than happy to help you further.

Excellent teacher! Very clear with what she's looking for in assignments, and willing to clarify if you have any further questions. States how many quizzes there will be, but does not say when or what they are over, so be prepared to come to class with the reading done just in case.

Took Ms. Buonomo last semester and she was the best professor I've had yet. She is very understanding of her students and was always willing to look over your papers before you turn them in. Come to class and give it some effort and she will make you feel very valued as a student of hers. Not the easiest grader, but makes it clear what she wants.

Just show up to class and you will pass. I would of passed with an A, but I failed becuase I had six absences. Just show up I promise it isn't worth wasting money or time on a class if ur gonna fail at the end of the day.
